posts.title: javaä¸‹çš„mongDBåŸºæ“
posts.text: çŸ¥è¯†ç‚¹ï¼šjava&MongDBï¼šå¯¼å…¥åŒ…ï¼š<dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.data</groupId> <artifactId>spring-data-mongodb</artifactId> <version>XXX</version> </dependency> 1. å®ä½“ç±»æ³¨æ„äº‹é¡¹ï¼š /** * æ ‡è¯†IDä¿¡æ¯ * æ’å…¥æ•°æ®æ—¶å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰æä¾›ï¼ŒMongoDBä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆ */ @Id private String id; 2. daoå±‚ï¼š/** * ç»§æ‰¿MongoRepositoryæ¥å£ï¼Œå…¶æä¾›äº†å¸¸ç”¨çš„CRUDæ“ä½œ * åªéœ€è¦å®šä¹‰æ¥å£ï¼Œä¸éœ€è¦å®ç°è¯¥æ¥å£ï¼ŒSpring Data Mongoä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆå®ç°è¯¥æ¥å£çš„ä»£ç†ç±» * å¹¶ä¸”æ ¹æ®æ¥å£çš„æ–¹æ³•åè¿›è¡Œç›¸åº”çš„æ“ä½œ * * MongoRepositoryæ³›å‹æ¥å£æœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªå‚æ•°ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯å®ä½“ç±»å’Œä¸»é”®ç±»å‹ */ 3. å¸¸ç”¨æ–¹æ³•ï¼š1. findAll() 2. deleteAll() 3. save() 4. count() 5. exists() åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ 6. existsById() 7. findByXXXX 8. findAll with Sort ä¾‹å­ï¼šList<User> users = userRepository.findAll(new Sort(Sort.Direction.ASC, "name")); 9. FindAll with Pageable ä¾‹å­ï¼š Pageable pageable = PageRequest.of(0, 1); Page<User> page = userRepository.findAll(pageable); List<User> users = pages.getContent(); 10. StartingWith å’Œ EndingWith ä¾‹å­ï¼š List<User> users = userRepository.findByNameStartingWith("N"); List<User> users = userRepository.findByNameEndingWith("o"); 11. Between ä¾‹å­ï¼š List<User> users = userRepository.findByAgeBetween(20, 50); 12. @Query ä¾‹å­ï¼š public interface PersonRepository extends MongoRepository<Person, String> { @Query("{ 'name' : ?0 }") List<Person> findWithQuery(String userId); } @Query(value = "{'statusHistories':{$elemMatch:{'status':{$in:['PROCESSABLE']}}},'created' : { '$gt' : { '$date' : ':?0' } , '$lt' : { '$date' : ':?1'}}}", count = true) Long countMe(@Param("dateFrom") Date datefrom, @Param("dateTo") Date dateTo); ä¾‹å­ï¼š//ä¸‹é¢ä¸¾ä¸ªä¾‹å­æ¥ç½—åˆ—ä¸‹å¸¸ç”¨æ–¹æ³•ï¼š public class User { /** * æ ‡è¯†IDä¿¡æ¯ * æ’å…¥æ•°æ®æ—¶å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰æä¾›ï¼ŒMongoDBä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆ */ @Id private String id; private String name; private String password; public User() { } public User(String name, String password) { this.name = name; this.password = password; } // çœç•¥get setæ–¹æ³• } public interface UserRepository extends MongoRepository<User, String> { /** * æ ¹æ®nameæŸ¥æ‰¾ * @param name name * @return user list */ List<User> findByName(String name); /** * åŒæ—¶æ ¹æ®nameå’ŒpasswordæŸ¥æ‰¾ * @param name name * @param password password * @return user list */ List<User> findByNameAndPassword(String name, String password); /** * åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥æ‰¾ * @param name name * @param pageable åˆ†é¡µè¯·æ±‚ * @return æŸ¥æ‰¾å‡ºçš„å½“å‰é¡µçš„ç»“æœ */ Page<User> findByName(String name, Pageable pageable); /** * è‡ªå®šä¹‰æŸ¥æ‰¾ * æŸ¥æ‰¾å§“åä¸ºname1 æˆ–è€… name2 çš„user * @param name1 name1 * @param name2 name2 * @return user list */ @Query("{'$or':[{'name': ?0}, {'name': ?1}]}") List<User> customFind(String name1, String name2); } é“¾æ¥ ä»¥ä¸Šä»…ä»…æ˜¯æœ€ç®€å•çš„é€‚ç”¨åœºæ™¯ï¼Œè¾ƒå¤æ‚çš„é€»è¾‘ï¼Œæµæ¶¨æš‚æœªååˆ†é€å½»ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å…ˆæä¾›ä¸ªè¾ƒä¸ºè¯¦ç»†çš„æ–‡ç« ï¼Œå…ˆè¿›è¡Œè¿‡æ¸¡ï¼š SpringBootä¹‹MongoTemplateçš„æŸ¥è¯¢å¯ä»¥æ€ä¹ˆè€ï¼šhttps://juejin.im/post/6844903760477569031
